NATIONWIDE LINKS:

Take Bus Eireann, Ulsterbus Feda O Donnell (Galway route) or John McGinley Coaches (Dublin Routes) to Derry or Letterkenny, and a local bus or taxi from there. 
From Belfast take NIR Railways to Derry and Lough Swilly Bus or taxi from there. 

LOCAL BUSES

From Derry :
Lough Swilly Bus Co runs regular buses from early morning until about 6PM.

From Letterkenny: 
Lough Swilly Bus Co
North West Busways

North West Busways

Ten minutes drive from buncrana (ask locals for directions) this fort and military museum is on the water's edge. guided tours available in the summertime.
Beautiful waterside walks and an old fort. (although you can't go inside the fort)
Just 2 minutes walk from the main street. This picturesque floodlit bridge is a favourite with artists and photographers.

located at castle bridge. fishing licenses for the Crana River can be obtained for the day, week or season, for both adults and minors.

Children's indoor adventure playground. 8 mins walk from main street

Grant's Shoes: a beautiful, small shoe shop, brilliantly stocked with the up-to-date brands and very friendly, local employees to cater for all your feet needs.

Identity': an attractive,small clothes shop where all the items are low in numbers and very fashionable, resulting in the ability to create funky, unique outfits to sophisticated, chic looks.
